purpose: To provide a robust framework for creating, deploying, and managing AI agent services
principle: Built on top of LangGraph for agent logic, FastAPI for backend services, and Streamlit for UI components
reusability: Highly modular with support for REST APIs, allowing easy integration into existing systems and extensibility for custom use cases
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have incomplete features and potential bugs; requires Python environment setup
name: agent-service-toolkit
description: Full toolkit for running an AI agent service built with LangGraph, FastAPI and Streamlit
highlight: Comprehensive toolkit for building AI agent services with an emphasis on easy integration and extensibility
